Item.Name: OXXFORD brand new 100% cashmere coat 42L
Item.Description: Brand new Oxxford men's sportcoat, size 42 long. (Check the measurements. The chest measures slightly bigger than a size 42. More like a 43L in the chest area) Brand new with tags and never worn or altered. Color is light greyish-green. Beautiful 100% cashmere. Luxurious and very soft. Medium weight..............(NOTE: you will see from one of the photos there are a couple very fine bumps in the material on the back of the collar. These are extremely small and fine. They are smaller than a pinhead and are almost impossible to see unless looking directly at the back of the collar and close up.)..................Completely handmade. All the seams, edges, lapels, etc. are handstitched. Even the seems alond the arms, back, etc. are hand sewn. You can see this in the photos......... You will see from the photos that this sportcoat is styled in the back a little differently. It has a small layer of extra material overlapping at the edge of the shoulders down to the middle of the coat. Also, it has a stretch of material sewn at the middle of the back, across the jacket. It looks vaguely like a belt. This is like an older style from the 1920's or 1930's................ Oxxford puts more time and effort into their garments than most custom made suits and coats. The absolute best quality in the entire world. Second to none when it comes to making quality, high end clothes. According to The Robb Report's 2000 annual list (a magazine for the affluent lifestyle), they top the list even over all the Italian greats like Brioni, Kiton, and Barbera........... Specs: Single breasted, 3 button. Non-vented. Pockets are hand stitched onto the coat. Inside there are 3 pockets on the left and 1 on the right. 26" from outside shoulder seam to end of sleeve. 34" from top of collar to bottom of coat. 46" around, when measured right under the arms. 19.75" from shoulder seam to shoulder seam, when measured straight across in the front............. I will give a 100% money back return if you decide the coat is not right for you. (Return does not include S&H. Must be returned within 15 days of your receipt. Item.Name: ClickHereTo HearAgain NEW Hearing aids #1 aid
Item.Description: BRAND NEW FDA REGISTERED HEARING AID with money back guarantee!!! For those of you that bought hearing aids from us before and are here to buy another one, thank you for remembering us. For you first time buyers, please check the feedback that others with hearing loss have left by clicking on BuyersOasis Feedback . We have sold hundreds of hearing aids on eBay alone and have made many people happy with them, we hope you will buy one and also be happy. (Don't forget to check our 100% money back guarantee). This brand new hearing aid you are bidding on was originally advertised on TV by Monte Hall for $225.00 and over 200,000 were sold! At that price it was considered a very good deal, at $65.00 it is a great deal! These hearing aids are US Government approved,(FDA) and there is no fitting or prescription required! However, we do recomend that you consult a specialist before putting on an assistive hearing device. These hearing aids are behind the ear models and are one of the best and most comfortable hearing aids you can buy. The aid will fit the right or left ear and it has a 6 level volume control. The frequency range is from 250Hz to 6500Hz, with a maximum gain of 46 db to an average gain of 38 db. The hearing aid comes in an elegant navy blue velvet case. Included are three batteries, a cleaning tool and three different size tips (small, medium and large) for a perfect fit to most ear canals. (Replacement batteries are easy to purchase at most convinient stores; Duracell # 675. We also sell batteries to clients that buy an aid from us) So if you are ready to hear again and cannot or just plainly do not want to spend hundreds or even thousands of dollars, this is the hearing aid for you! If you have any questions, please feel free to eMail us by clicking on BuyersOasis@aol.com You can also check our other hearing aid auctions by clicking here BuyerOasis other auctions SHIPPING CHARGES, GUARANTEE AND WARNING: SHIPPING CHARGES: Buyer to pay $7.75 for shippping, handling and insurance on the first hearing aid. On purchases of two or more, the total shipping cost will be $11.50. 3 DAY MONEY BACK GAURANTEE!! If you are not 100% satisfied with your hearing aid, for whatever reason, you have three (3) days from the date of delivery to return it for a full refund less the shipping cost and $5.00 to cover eBay related charges. WARNING!!! Other eBay sellers are offering the Whisper XL hearing aid and other low quality hearing aids at a lower price than our premium hearing aid. Before purchasing thier's, remember that OUR'S IS FDA APPROVED and their Whisper was banned in the U.S. Read the terrible things that were said about the Whisper by clicking here FDA Report Also, other eBay sellers are auctioning used hearing aids, factory seconds and returns. Some of them even use our ad verbage and hearing aid specs. Do not be mislead! Check their feedback and notice that they have little or no positive feedback on any of their hearing aid products. Ours is the premium model and BRAND NEW !!! Our feedback on these hearing aids says it all. The only other seller of this hearing aid is my friend and partner Russ5000. Thank you for viewing our auction! We look forward to hearing from you! Free Honesty Counters powered by Andale! Visit BuyersOasis today! Payment Details U.S. Shipping and Handling $7.75 Shipping Insurance per item - Sales Tax (none) _ Learn more about checkout Payment Instructions Free 3 day guarantee. If the hearing aid does not meet your needs return it within three day and we will refund your purchase price less shipping, handeling and $5.00 for eBay related charges. We also have a 90-day and 1-year warrantee ($10 & $25). If anything happens to your hearing aid within the warrantee period, return it and we wiill send you a new hearing aid.

Item.Name: 2 fleece outfits, size 24 months - Old Navy!
Item.Description: This is a cute size 24 months lot of two warm fleece outfits! The first outfit is by Old Navy and it is adorable! It is size XXL which fits 24-30 months, and it is 100% polyester fleece. The print is a black and white cow print, and the top can be worn as a shirt or a jacket. The hood of the top has little cow ears on top of it, and it has two front pockets. The pants are elastic waist. This outfit is adorable and is in excellent _as new_ condition! The second outfit is size 24 months by Babycrest and is 100% THICK polyester fleece. The top is Henley-style with three snaps at the neck, and it has a letter B with _All Star Player_ embroidered underneath it, body is navy blue and arms are forest green. The hood is lined with soft plaid flannel and the waist of the shirt is elastic. The pants are forest green with an elastic waist and elastic cuffs. This outfit is in very good condition with a small amount of pilling from wear _ fleece always seems to do that. Still a great outfit for the cold winter months! Shipping of $3.95 is buyer_s responsibility and insurance is extra, only at buyer_s request. I will also ship via parcel post for less, just ask. Payment must be made in 10 days from auction close or item will be relisted and I will file a non-paying bidder report with Ebay. I accept payments via credit card or bank account through PayPal, money orders, and personal checks. Personal checks will only be accepted with 10 or more positive feedbacks _ no negatives, and I will hold the check for 10 days or until it clears my bank. Free Honesty Counters powered by Andale! Item.Name: Black winter full length coat by Concept size
Item.Description: Black winter full length coat by Concept size 5 NR This is an elegant, straight-cut full length black coat by Concept. The tag says size five, but please go by the measurements. The coat is double breasted with two black buttons side by side. It has a low cut collar with 3 _ inch lapels, which can be buttoned closed at the neck, but would also look great open with a contrasting wool scarf underneath. The top of the arms at the shoulders are pleated, and it has two sewn-in pleats down the back at the sides and two at the side/front, which encase the two slit pockets. The sleeves are straight with no cuffs, to complete the long sophisticated lines of the design. The coat is in excellent condition. We will ship to the gift recipient at no additional charge Payment Terms - payment due within 10 days of auction close: Checks (held 12 days from date of deposit) and $25.00 bounced check fee Money orders/cashiers checks Paypal (We are verified ) Mastercard, Visa and Discover through Bidpay (small fee involved) Well hidden cash at your own risk, correct amounts only, no small change returned Numerous other payment systems. Don't see your favorite? Check our "about me" page for an updated list of payment types we accept Great British Pounds (equivalent based on pre-determined rate of exchange), paid to our agent in London, however shipping is computed on US rates, as that is where the item is We do not accept credit cards directly ID Verified: Through ID Verify, our personal information was cross-checked against consumer and business databases for consistency. ID Verify uses a third party to check the information we provided and verified that information for accuracy. Why did we pay this fee? To assure our customers that we are a legitimate business, not some fly-by-night Ebayers here today, gone tomorrow. Bidders should verify their seller is ID Verified by clicking their feedback profile. It's an extra safety measure to be assured against seller scams. __ Invoicing: All bidders are emailed an invoice within 12 hours of the auction close, however they occasionally get lost in cyberspace. If it has been 24 hours since the auction has closed, you should send us an email and let us know your invoice hasn't arrived. Winning bidders must contact us within 3 days of the auction close, or you may forfeit the item won. Shipment: S/H quoted is using normal packing methods, within the US. If you are overseas, have an unusual packing request (like double boxing), or are a multiple item winner, contact us for rates. We do not ship UPS, we ship USPS and Fedex (including Fedex Ground). S/H fees are non refundable. No s/h fee is charged if goods are picked up locally within 10 days of auction close. Shipping discounts for multiple items purchased only apply on items closing on the same day, paid at the same time, shipped to the same address . MAIL SAFETY: Please note that we have started to see an very high delay in the mail. payments are arriving to us late, even though they were mailed on time, and shipments to buyers are taking as much as 10 days even though 90% of our sales ship priority mail. This is to be expected in these troubled times. EVERYTHING shipped by us bears our company name "Highland Auction Services Inc" on the outside of the package, and NOTHING we use as a packing product resembles any type of granular substance. Taxes: FL residents will be charged 7% sales tax. International bidders: Please do not ask us to break US law by marking your parcel as a "gift", we will not do so. Insurance is not available on some international packages, please ask. Bidder Judgement : We reserve the right to refuse/cancel bids by individuals with poor feedback ratings. If you are on our banned bidder list, this applies to all ebay user names within the same household. Please do not attempt to use your husbands, daughters etc.. user name to re-bid Guarentee: All items are sold as-is unless the item description specifically states otherwise. Damaged Goods: If the item arrives damaged or is lost during shipping and you purchased insurance we will send you the insurance certificate. Claim paperwork is your responsibility If the item arrives damaged or is lost during shipping and you did not purchase insurance we can not reimburse you. Ebay Downtime: We reserve the right to relist any item if ebay is down when this auction closes, unless the auction is extended Escrow: Escrow accepted only if your winning bid exceeds $500.00. Escrow not accepted on as-is sales. All escrow fees are at buyers expense. Feedback: We love giving positive feedback, however we will give negative feedback and/or file a NPB notice if you do not honor your_winning bid within 10 days. Copyright: All photographs, titles and text are the property of Highland Auction Services Inc, and we will protect those rights via Ebay's VERO program. No un-authorised copy of any photographs, titles or text is allowed. Not for Ebay Resale: Because we sell at wholesale pricing, by bidding on our items you are verifying that the goods you are purchasing will not be sold by you, your associates, business partners or any member of your immediate family on ebay for a period of 12 months from the date of auction close. Questions: If you have any questions or concerns before, during or after an auction please email us. If you need an immediate answer try instant messaging "highlandauctions" on aol Ebay members since Saturday, Mar 06, 1999 Ebay Power sellers since November 20, 2000 Payment Details See item description and Payment Instructions, or contact seller for more information. Payment Instructions as-is no returns

Item.Description: 14 KT GOLD 6 MM OMEGA NECKLACE - 16" Description This is a fabulous Omega necklace that is 16 inches in length and is made of 14 kt gold overlaid on a brass base. The gold is 50 mills thick compared to the normal 5-7 mills of gold plating. The necklace is 6 mm in width. This necklace will look great all by itself or you can add your own pendants/sliders. This product comes with a written lifetime warranty for any defects including tarnishing. We pride ourselves in providing exceptional customer service and excellent jewelry values for your dollar. But, the most important value we offer is customer service. Any item may be returned for a full refund within 14 days for any reason (minus shipping and handling charges). As our customer, we promise you complete satisfaction with every transaction. We didn't invent customer service; we just work very hard to perfect it. This bag would go great with a black dress Please see shipping costs/methods and insurance requirements below. For larger items please click here to email us for a quote. All breakables and items valued near and above $50 will have insurance required. If the item is shipped via FedEx this coverage is automatic up to $100 in value, 40_ for each additional $100 coverage. For USPS delivery, $1.25 up to $50, $1.00 each additional $100. All uninsured parcels become the responsiblity of the bidder once said parcel is duly delivered to the appropriate carrier. DELIVERY CAN BE MADE WITHIN A 250 MILE RADIUS OF OUR STORE ON OUR LARGER ITEMS. PLEASE EMAIL FOR A DELIVERY QUOTE The following types of payment are accepted: money orders, personal checks*, and all major credit cards. Payment must be received within 10 business days in order to avoid negative feedback and being reported to eBay as a non-payer. This will also expedite shipping of your item. * All returned checks will be accessed a $25 service fee. Buyer to pay $5.00 for shipping and handling. All international bidders MUST email us for an adjusted S&H quote! . Ma residents pay a 5% sales tax. SHIPPING METHODS: The bidder may at any time request the shipping service of their choice, to which will be added an appropriate handling fee. MEDIA: We have been shipping media items (records, books, etc.) by Media mail, but have experienced slow delivery times, so we are trying to move away from this service. Smaller, light-weight media items over 13 ozs. are still quoted for Media mail and the bidder may request a different delivery service. However, we WILL NOT be held responsible for the long amount of time any Media mail shipment may take. SMALLER ITEMS: Other smaller items up to 13 ozs. are shipped first class. All other items are shipped either Priority mail or FedEx. Usually anything over a few pounds is shipped via FedEx, hence the higher costs. However, their exemplary service is guarenteed, carries automatic insurance up to $100 in value, and is trackable with out additional cost. Any item shipped through the USPS Priority service without requesting additional services such as delivery confirmation can not be tracked, nor will we be held responsibility for its not being delivered (see insurance disclaimer above). LARGER ITEMS: Larger items such as furniture and such are shipped either with BAX Global or a local mover we use who makes east coast runs every two-three weeks. HANDLING FEES: Since our shipping department needs to eat (and we require him to wear shoes, please! ), and shipping materials do cost money (really!) all items have an appropriate handling fee. Basically, the more time and care taken to prepare an item for safe transport, the higher the fee. We do our best to provide both cost effective and careful handling of packaging your item. This fee is not negotiable and is usually reflected in all posted S&H charges, or added to shipping quotes for larger items. Created by eBay Seller's Assistant Pro

Item.Name: Add Water, Mix, and Serve - Mack R Mixer
Item.Description: Koncrete Industries in Walla Walla , Washington runs 14 readymix concrete trucks, and each one features different graphics on its mixer drum. Many of the slogans employ a play on words. They're all Kenworths and Peterbilts, but when the folks in WW saw the incredible detail on First Gear's Mack mixer, they said, "We want one of those with our name on it, even if it is a Mack!" Well, I guess they couldn't decide which design to use on the model, so they had three different models made! Minimum quantity on a First Gear truck is usually 720 pieces, but because Koncrete was doing three at once they were allowed to have just 504 of each design manufactured. That makes this a pretty scarce replica. Add Water, Mix and Serve is the name of this version. That's the slogan printed on the mixer drum in blue block letters. The graphics are just like "the real thing," even if the model is a Mack! Add it to your fleet today, or give it as a special Christmas present. I have all three versions up for sale on eBay right now, so choose your favorite or get the whole trio! The Legal Mumbo Jumbo: Successful bidder pays actual priority mail postage & insurance within the US, or actual air or surface mail postage/insurance charges to a foreign destination. Insurance is highly recommended. Payment accepted by check or money order, Visa or MasterCard (via PayPal orBidPay only), or Discover Card (via BidPay only). Money order or check must be payable in US dollars on a US bank, or a US branch of a foreign bank. If you send cash through the mail it is at your risk; I do not recommend it. If you decline insurance you assume the risk of loss or damage in transit. Insurance claims must be filed by you with the post office, as I am not an insurance company or a claims adjuster. Item.Description: NWT HUGO BOSS BLAKLABL 3BT SPORTCOAT 48 R 48R THANKS FOR HELPING US JOIN EBAY'S 500 CLUB! FREE SHIPPING FOR "BUY IT NOW" PURCHASE IN THE USA!! !!922 WOW! THIS IS A BRAND SPANKING NEW WITH TAGS 3 BUTTON SINGLE BREASTED SPORTCOAT FROM HUGO BOSS FOR THEIR PRIMERE BLACK LABEL! And its simply immaculate! This is my absolute favorite color for this time of year, a rusty, brown and light green blend, I mean these are the exact colors of beautiful Fall leaves. This is an amazingly attractive super weave amalgam of wool (51%), linen (34%) nylon (15%) crepe-like fabric, that has been perfectly cut and crafted to perfectly accentuate the form of your body....not to mention your stature in the eyes of all who are forced to enjoy watching you strut your stuff! It has to be seen and worn to be fully appreciated. Its awesome! IN BRAND SPANKING NEW, PERFECT CONDITION. This sportcoat is a light to mid weight, and comes styled with notched lapels, besom pockets, unvented, and fully lined. This coat also boasts buttons made from olive brown Ivory nut, a seed of a tropical fruit with extra high firmness, and natural grain and horn buttons three for closure and 3 on each sleeve, but with a few extra buttons in the pocket (in the Hugo Boss envelope, you know the one, the little black one...). Just one more point, have you noticed the way that many inferior (cheap) quality suits and designers place the 3 button closure too low down and too close together to really give the wearer the slimming effect that this cut traditionally provides?? Well, no worries here, its done right! These buttons are perfectly placed and spaced, WHAT MORE COULD YOU WANT!!?? HERE'S A LITTLE BIT ABOUT HUGO BOSS AND THEIR LABELS: The HUGO BOSS Group HUGO BOSS is fashion. HUGO BOSS is lifestyle. HUGO BOSS is success. Three brands make HUGO BOSS one of the world's leading fashion groups: BOSS, HUGO and BALDESSARINI. BOSS BOSS is successful. International. Dynamic. Modern. BOSS is cosmopolitan. A lifestyle merging business and sports. For men and, starting this year, for women worldwide. BOSS/Hugo Boss, the company's core brand, is tailored to the success-oriented, dynamic personality with a quintessentially masculine style. BOSS is well-known for business suits HUGO HUGO is trend. HUGO is young. An unconventional lifestyle for the upbeat scene. HUGO Man and Woman - different and avant-garde. Hugo Boss is a philosophy and a way of life. The world of Hugo Boss is a cosmopolitan world of style, art and design; of sports and glamour, fun and passion: a world of fashion. With the three brands BOSS, HUGO and BALDESSARINI, Hugo Boss makes, markets and licenses a full spectrum of products, including fine clothing. HAPPY BIDDING! MEASUREMENTS JACKET SHOULDERS 20" SLEEVE 26.5"(1.5" TO LET) CHEST 52" WAIST 48"(LABEL READS 46R) LENGTH 32.5" from the bottom of the collar. Item.Name: NWT HICKEY FREEMAN CAMEL SPORTCOAT 42L 42
Item.Description: NWT HICKEY FREEMAN CAMEL SPORTCOAT 42L 42 1666526160 WE NOW ACCEPT CONSIGNMENTS FROM YOU...DROP US A LINE!!841 This is without question THE MOST EXQUISITE Hickey Freeman sportcoats I have ever seen! It is a brand spanking new three button single breasted, jacket that is made from one of the lightest softest 100% pure Camel Hair fabrics you've ever felt!! This coat is made from a chocolate brown and tan diagonally ribbed fabric that is overlaid by a mocha and white windowpane, its simple exquisite!! WITH ALL ORIGINAL TAGS FROM NEIMAN MARCUS, FOR THEIR DESIGNER COLLECTION!! THIS JACKET IS BRAND SPANKING NEW, AND GORGEOUS!! Made as the details listed below from their site attests, this current design really is a cut above the many we have offered in the past on eBay. Made for their Hickey Freeman Collection at Neiman Marcus, this suit's coat is single vented and fully lined in Bemberg, with 4 buttons on each sleeve in addition to the notched lapels and flap pockets. The coat is darted for accentuated fit and the appearance of manly wide shoulders with an athletically slim waist...(even if its not exactly the case!) THIS JACKET IS ABSOLUTELY BRAND SPANKING NEW, WITH ALL ORIGINAL TAGS!! Here's some info on HICKEY FREEMAN and their "labors of love" Fabric One of the first things you may notice when looking at a Hickey-Freeman suit is the elegance and finesse of the fabric. Textiles from the finest mills of Italy and Great Britain are woven from rich, lustrous yarns of wool and silk. The textures, patterns and colors are designed to ensure the distinctive, exclusive look that is Hickey-Freeman's hallmark. Canvas Front Construction Hickey-Freeman uses the finest canvas for interlinings, the canvas front is an exclusive light-weight construction that adds lasting shape and body to the coat front without the heavy stiffness of lesser quality canvas. Fit The Hickey-Freeman garment is immediately noticed in the graceful way the coat lapel rolls and in the way the coat front hugs the chest like a second skin. Bemberg Lining Hickey-Freeman coats are lined with Bemberg lining the "gold standard" of linings. Sponging/Inspecting While high quality fabrics and trimmings are pre-shrunk at the mill, Hickey-Freeman subjects these products to a second conditioning process to ensure predictable, uniform behavior throughout manufacturing and the life of the garment. Re-conditioning of fabrics, thread, pocketing, and interlining assures you of long-lasting comfort, fit, and appearance. Undercollars The Hickey-Freeman undercollar interlining is made of fine Irish linen. It is "married" to the undercollar cloth, a woven wool flannel (not a pressed "felt"). As a result, the interlining has resilience and body characteristics that are transferred to the coat collar. The undercollar is made of two parts, rather than one, to ensure an easy, natural "hug" to the curve of the neck. Silk Thread Most sewing operations are accomplished with silk thread. Silk provides strength, elasticity, and "memory" (it returns to its original length after being stretched) plus reliable color brilliance and fastness. Silk gives seams a soft, thin, and flexible characteristic while holding up to the constant stresses of daily wear, dry cleanings and pressings. Buttons Turned from the horns of the water buffalo and Mother-of-Pearl shells, Hickey-Freeman's buttons offer durability and a richness of color and texture that are unmatched by man-made materials. Hand Pressing Hand pressing sets the fit, style and appearance of each coat. Linings, darts, outside pockets, side seams, shoulder seams, front edges and facings are hand pressed by experienced pressers. Hand Tailoring The buttonholes of a Hickey-Freeman coat are hand sewn with long-wear silk thread over a fine twist-free linen gimp. Hand-sewn buttonholes yield durability with a soft, flexible feel. Hickey-Freeman's list of hand tailoring includes: Hand-fitted armhole and shoulder settings. Hand fitted vents. Hand sewn buttonholes and bar tacks. Neck hanger. Micro-hand-stitched label. Pressing and finishing of linings. Side and shoulder seams. Pockets. Collar corner and vent felling. All ensure that each and every garment achieves that perfect feel, the precise fit, and the lasting impression that makes a Hickey-Freeman feel like a second skin. FREE SHIPPING FOR "BUY IT NOW" PURCHASE IN THE USA!!991 This is another excellent Armani masterpiece from Legendary Designer Giorgio Armani, for his Le Collezioni Label. Made in Italy IN VERY GOOD CONDITION This coat is intricately woven, and crafted from a fabric that blends olive green, brown, rust and teal highlights in a 90% linen composite 10% viscose cloth that is remarkably soft. This coat drapes beautifully and it is very luxurious and airy. The fabric is very understated and fully lined. This coat is unvented, has besom pockets, a pocket for your cell phone or airline tickets and 3 buttons on each sleeve, its easy to see why the world's biggest celebrity males routinely wear Armani. It is of exceptional quality and usually costs an arm and a leg! There is little if any question at all that the raiments from GIORGIO ARMANI'S LE COLLEZIONI LABEL are of impeccable quality and style. Making the Le Collezioni label one of the most respected, and most sought after labels in the world! AND AS A RESULT ONE OF THE MOST EXPENSIVE!! (BUT NOT HERE!!) GIORGIO ARMANI is one of the world's premiere designers in large part because of the way he revolutionized the way jackets and coats and suits were worn. this piece adds to that legacy THERE WAS AN EXHIBIT ON HIS IMPACT IN FASHION AT THE GUGGENHEIM IN NYC. HERE IS AN EXCERPT FROM THE CNN ARTICLE: (CNN) -- It was the jacket that helped change the rules of fashion. In 1975, Giorgio Armani introduced what became known as the deconstructed jacket, a loose, informal coat that proved to be a radical break from the conservative or offbeat clothing that came before. New York's Guggenheim Museum recognizes Armani's considerable contributions in a retrospective that features about 400 of his fashions. The show examines the cultural impact of his designs. It's the first time the museum has dedicated one show to an individual designer, and it's said to be the largest one-man fashion exhibition ever presented in New York. The Armani company is now worth more than $2 billion with a retail network that covers 33 countries. "Fashion is at the heart of human expression, and is a mirror that reflects society and its culture," he said. "My philosophy has always been to help women and men feel comfortable and confident through the clothes that they wear, rather than to create decoration for the sake of it. This belief continues to be at the root of my work as we enter the new millennium." SO I HOPE THAT YOU WILL LOVE THE EXPERIENCE OF OWNING AND WEARING THIS COAT. BID AWAY!! MEASUREMENTS SHOULDERS 19" SLEEVES 24.5" (1.5" to let out) CHEST 43" WAIST 38"(LABEL SAYS 48R European) LENGTH 30.5" from the bottom of the collar.
